verses.roman:
kāhāṅ mora prāṇa-nātha muralī-vadana
kāhāṅ karoṅ kāhāṅ pāṅ vrajendra-nandana

synonyms: kāhāṅ—where; mora—My; prāṇa-nātha—Lord of the life; muralī-vadana—playing the flute; kāhāṅ—what; karoṅ—shall I do; kāhāṅ—where; pāṅ—I shall get; vrajendra-nandana—the son of Mahārāja Nanda.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu used to express His mind in this way, "Where is the Lord of My life, who is playing His flute? What shall I do now? Where should I go to find the son of Mahārāja Nanda?
